column1: Meneldor was a great Eagles of the northern mountains
column2: one of the followers of Gwaihir. He was among the squadron of Eagles who flew to the aid of the Captains of the West in the last desperate battle before the Gate of Mordor. With his lord Gwaihir
column4: he flew into the Mordor to the rescue of Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee
column5: and carried one of these two (we are not told which) out of the destruction of Mount Doom.

column1: The first element of his name menel is both a Sindarin and Quenya word meaning "the heavens".
2003: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King:
:http://lotrtcgwiki.com/wiki/lotr17022 A card in Deciphers The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game confirms one of the eagles that rescued Frodo and Sam was Meneldor.
Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
